div.h2: WELCOME TO WATERFORD UNION HIGH SCHOOL
div.p:
Waterford Union High School exists to provide students the opportunities to acquire the
knowledge, skills and experiences to become successful and responsible adults.

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

h2.style: border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(4, 99, 48); margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-family: lusitanaregular; font-weight: normal; padding-bottom: 5px;

strong.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 24px;
letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

a.title: click

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-decoration: underline;

a.span: Due to the changes to our PowerSchool server, students and parents experiencing difficulty with the PowerSchool App will need to uninstall and reinstall. You will be asked for our District Code.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

p.style: font-size: 11pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

h2.style: font-size: 26px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(4, 99, 48); margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-family: lusitanaregular; font-weight: normal; padding-bottom: 5px;

span.style: color: rgb(12, 12, 12);
font-family: "Courier New";

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-align: left;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

h4.style: color: rgb(169, 169, 169); font-family: Raleway, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;

span.style: color: black;
span.strong: The Waterford Union High School District values the health and well-being of our students, staff, and families. Safety is always our priority.

h4.style: color: rgb(169, 169, 169); font-family: Raleway, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

h4.span: Due to the health and wellness concerns related to the pandemic virus, the Waterford Union High School District will be closed indefinitely until further notice.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.div:
School Resource Officer A GoFundMe Page has been set up to raise money for a School Resource Office. You can find the link below.
https://www.gofundme.com/f/safety-resource-officer-waterford-union-hs?utm_source=customer&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=m_pd+share-sheet

span.style: color: rgb(12, 12, 12);

div.div: WUHS has met the criteria for 2018-2019 WSMA Accreditation: Click to see more!

h2.style: font-size: 26px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(4, 99, 48); margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-family: lusitanaregular; font-weight: normal; padding-bottom: 5px;

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;

span.style: font-family: Verdana; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span:
To report an incident/safety concern using the telephone tip line, simply call
(262) 534-3189

span.style: font-family: Verdana; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Or access the Safe School Form!

div.p: Waterford Union High School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. Waterford Union High School also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
